result.purpose: Responsible for defining models and constants related to notification types and handling in the notification domain.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating related functionalities and models for notifications in a dedicated directory.

internal/domains/notification/models/apn.purpose: Defines push notification types for APNs (Apple Push Notification service).

internal/domains/notification/models/con.purpose: Defines constants used in the notification domain.

internal/domains/notification/models/mes.purpose: Defines a message model for post notifications with methods for timestamp and idempotency key generation.

internal/domains/notification/models/pus.purpose: Defines models for push notification handling including recipients, payloads, and request structures.
